label: Every current principal dancer except for Gonzalo Garcia attended the School of American Ballet full-time, joining on average at 15 years old

name: Gonzalo Garcia
label: Gonzalo Garcia attended San Francisco Ballet School, joined the main company and became a principal there before he joined NYCB as a principal

name: Megan Fairchild and Tiler Peck
label: Megan Fairchild and Tiler Peck were promoted to principal at only 20 years old
